Key Match Events: The Mets built a strong lead in the first inning with a three-run homer by Pete Alonso
The Mets had a five-run rally against Jack Flaherty in the third inning
Ryne Stanek recorded a career-high seven outs in the game
Edwin Díaz recorded the final six outs of the game
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Carlos Mendoza asked Ryne Stanek and Edwin Díaz to be ready for multi-inning assignments
Mendoza had ridden left-hander Danny Young for three ‘ups’ in Game 4 to save the rest of the bullpen
Post-Match Reflections: Outfielder Jesse Winker called the bullpen'savages'
Edwin Díaz said 'Today was the day, like, we’ve got to go forward'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' bullpen was short-handed in Game 6
Others: The Dodgers' manager Dave Roberts spoke about remaining'steadfast in how you use your pitchers, because ultimately, it’s about winning four games in a seven-game series'
